column4: I have a quick question when I try to burn a dvd in k3b or gnome baker it errors and won't let me do it... I tried to run the config from the terminal but it tells me it doesn't exist
some cheap cds and dvds can'T get burned all theway to the edge,  that might be the problem , you'd need to put a little less data onthem
and its not the iso because I burned it on my Mac with no problems using the same media
